title: Add Power Query Template section to template_overview10.md
description: Add comprehensive Power Query template documentation to template_overview10.md. Include description of the template structure, when to use it, component listing, Phase 0 workflow, LLM pitfalls, 5-dimension difficulty scoring, and integration with task management system.
notes: Added comprehensive Power Query Template section as section 5 in template_overview10.md (lines 271-380). Included: directory structure, Phase 0 workflow (4 steps + 5 outputs), LLM pitfalls checklist, 5-dimension difficulty scoring system, when to use comprehensive vs minimal approach, and integration with task management system. Positioned after Hybrid Template and before Task Management System section.
